parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Copy the chain of waypoints from source to target group. The target group will start to process waypoints from the first one.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> groupTo '''copyWaypoints''' groupFrom

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> groupTo: [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> groupFrom: [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>group1 copyWaypoints group2;
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[waypointSpeed]]
</value></part></template>
